channel.title: Titan614-Friendly Community-Vote4Cash
channel.description:
[img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/4928/titanpromobanner.jpg[/img]
Brief Introduction:
Our primary goal for Titan 614 is to ensure that the game-play for Titan 614 resembles accurately as possible to RuneScape's gameplay.
Combat:
- Perfect maxhit formulas (All max hits are perfected for every weapon including ranged bows) - Most weapons working (All weapons work properly and accurately except special attacks, we're currently developing them) - Double vengeance has been patched (After you've already casted vengeance, you must now wait 30 seconds) - Poisoning (Anti-poisons work too) - Mage stacking with melee has been patched - Korasi formula perfect! - Autocasting - Perfect switching
Server:
- Dedicated owner & staff [Currently looking for moderators] - Weekly updates - Fully DDos Protection - Protected Site - Friendly players - Active community - Active Pking & clans
Other Features:
- Friends List working completely (on, off, private) - Perfect working shops system (buying and selling items) - Clan Chats - HD Graphics - No Lagging - 24/7 Hosted Dedi - Donatorzone and shops - Mac/Windows compatible - Dicing - Pk shops - Voteshop
[img]http://rs-live.com/Home&Starter.png[/img]
[img]http://rs-live.com/pkshop.png[/img]
[img]http://rs-live.com/safepk.png[/img]
[img]http://rs-live.com/voteshop.png[/img]
[img]http://i1062.photobucket.com/albums/t488/Test_Person/screenshot2.png[/img]
[img]http://i1062.photobucket.com/albums/t488/Test_Person/screenshot4.png[/img]
For images of the server feel free to check out: [url=http://www.titan614.com/index.php?topic=14193.0]http://www.titan614.com/index.php?topic=14193.0[/url]
Forums --- [url=http://www.titan614.com/index.php]http://www.titan614.com/index.php[/url] Play Now --- [url=http://www.titan614.com/play/]http://www.titan614.com/play/[/url] Voting Page --- [url=http://titan614.com/vote]http://titan614.com/vote[/url] Downloadable Client --- [url=http://titan614.com/download/]http://titan614.com/download/[/url]
Too find out more go to www.titan614.com and join us today!

item.title: Titan614-Friendly Community-Vote4Cash
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Doesn’t really look like anything special, prove me wrong?

Also, you’re not fully ddos protected, no one is. People pay $4000+ per month on hosting for ddos protection and they’re still vulnerable to a good botnet.

Read full topic
